column1: Smoque BBQ////It had been a 5 for me
column2: and i was a weekly regular
column3: but then I started getting painfully dry St. Louis ribs. I course-corrected. I made it my Sunday brunch-of-choice
column4: getting there when they opened the doors on Sunday mornings
column5: and usually focusing on those St. Louis ribs
column6: but sometimes on the sliced brisket. This worked for a while
